fn.p: The authors declare no conflict of interest.
This article is a PNAS Direct Submission.
Data deposition: Data have been deposited as part of the Inter-Sectoral Impact Model Intercomparison Project, https://esg.pik-potsdam.de/search/isimip/?sector=Terrestrial_Biodiversity.
This article contains supporting information online at www.pnas.org/lookup/suppl/doi:10.1073/pnas.1807745115/-/DCSupplemental.
